name: create-sbc-app
description: Scaffold a new SBC App Kit project with one command.

scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run test-pack
scripts.test-cli: mkdir -p test-cli && cd test-cli && node ../bin/cli.js test-app --template react && rm -rf test-cli
scripts.prepare-publish: npm run build && npm run test-pack && npm run test-cli
scripts.publish-patch: npm run prepare-publish && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run prepare-publish && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run prepare-publish && npm version major && npm publish

author: SBC Team
